short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send highlighted text to ChatGPT and explore follow-up queries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Google Chrome extension which helps You immediately understand unfamiliar words, terms and phrases in any language. Now available in English, Croatian, Chinese and Hindi!

Use it to help You learn a language or immediately understand any topics you aren’t familiar with. The Chat feature allows you to ask follow-up questions to ensure you get to the bottom of whatever it is you’re trying to understand.
